creator: yyamano@kt.rim.or.jp
text:
scp.html refers to itself. I guess it must be sshexec.html. Please apply this patch. Index: docs/manual/OptionalTasks/scp.html =================================================================== --- docs/manual/OptionalTasks/scp.html (revision 605605) +++ docs/manual/OptionalTasks/scp.html (working copy) @@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ href="../install.html#librarydependencies">Library Dependencies for more information. This task has been tested with jsch-0.1.2 and later.

-

See also the scp task

+

See also the sshexec task

Parameters
